channel.title: Need help with making myself admin!
channel.description: Hi, I'm really new to Moparscape.. My server isnt up and i want to make myself an admin before i put it up. My question is: CAN I MAKE MYSELF AN ADMIN IF MY SERVER IS NOT UP?? If I can then please tell me how, If i can't then please let me know, it will be greatly appreciated.. Thanks!! :confused:

gl with ur server

item.title: Need help with making myself admin!
item.dc:creator: @pauler pauler
item.description:
@pauler wrote:

go to rs2 server downloads. look for zammyscape download. download it… run its server bat… hen log in and out go to char and make ur self admin

item.title: Need help with making myself admin!
item.dc:creator: @xxskillxx xxskillxx
item.description:
@xxskillxx wrote:

i’m on hybridscape and my server isnt up… do you still know where i can search?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 21, 2006, 09:38:23 PM[/size][hr]where’s my char file and how do i find it?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 21, 2006, 09:39:03 PM[/size][hr]Can anyone else help!? MY SERVER IS NOT UP! AND IT IS HYBRIDSCAPE, I WANT TO MAKE MYSELF ADMIN. EXPLAIN WELL PLEASE! THANK YOU!!! :rolleyes:

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with making myself admin!

item.title: Need help with making myself admin!
item.dc:creator: @pauler pauler
item.description:
@pauler wrote:

on pk servers… go to ur char file after logging out. Then look for ur char rights. Thenchange the 0 to a 3 for owner, 2 for admin, 1 for mod, 0 for normal. -1 for banned

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with making myself admin!
